headline: Is Polo Ralph Lauren Priced Right After Strong Q1 Earnings and 61% One-Year Surge?
summary: If you are weighing your options on Ralph Lauren stock, you are not alone. This iconic brand has been making headlines with some impressive moves, and investors are tuning in to see what might come next. With shares closing at $327.76 most recently, Ralph Lauren has not just kept pace with the broader market but has outpaced it by a wide margin: up 5.9% over the last week, 7.1% for the month, a striking 41.5% so far this year, and a stellar 61.1% over the past twelve months. Stretch that...
